post.body: lol. (just lol)
oh it is. But I will be okay. I think. Thank you.
wow. Fantastic.
oh my goodness! lol
thanks. I know it will but I am just so impatient. Had I not selected expedited shipping, I would completely lose my mind.
I was waiting for a writing book I ordered. Only day 3. Must chill.
that is a great story. Adultery is ugly. Divorce is ugly. Forgiveness is a miracle we are blessed to have and receive.
if that was his first message, I would tell him forget it. You don't have time to eff around, you have an income to work on!
glad I could help. I wish you all the productivity in the world.
yeah, and taking students. Lol.
aww geez. That is terrible, not to mention awkward.
I would like to but I am my own enabler. Go figure.
how many ideas do you need?
I am to no end. I have admittedly made quite a bit of fumbles in the process.
I feel that way about it as well.
thanks. I have a lot of ideas. If I had an investor and a developer, J Enterprises would be in full swing!
I am also going to write a lot less articles and spend much more time to write higher quality stuff.
I gotcha there. I am working on a novella. ...
that's no joke! I got up at 2 am today because I couldn't wait to pounce on new idea.
yWriter is a writing software aimed at novelists but works pretty well for nonfiction as well.
yeah it seems neat. I got yEdit, yWriter, and Sonar. All very cool and helpful!
thanks for the interesting social media read.
Very cool. I will love to see that at WS.
I love your new picture. You are so gorgeous!
Ugh. Just got the mail. NO BOOK!!
Isn't it shocking that when we are our own bosses, we let ourselves be bad employees? Geez. I have been bad and I know it.
Is it #2009 yet?!!
spends too much time on the computer. A bird tweeping in time with my scrolls made me fool with my laptop speakers and investigate!
3 new comments on "PotPieGirl.com" and more http://bit.ly/6ECh
2 new comments on "Mike's Money Making Mission" and more http://bit.ly/6ECh
New comment on "Slowing Down" http://bit.ly/2Jxx
New comment on "Dear Friends," http://bit.ly/wLzM
Friends, please read this. I am moving Twitters, so this is important. http://tinyurl.com/74vxac
If it is incovenient for others, how selfish is it to change when you feel like you need to?
Does anyone have any experiences with Yahoo! Groups?
Yay! I just whacked all of my DMs!
I will love Flock twittering when all my DMs are gone so I don't have a msg alert!
Downloading yWriter. Anyone use it?
So far, so good with Flock. Going to visit the @WriYe forums. See you soon Tweeples.
I am writing/rewriting my profile "about me" content for fb, myspace, digg, wp
